about_the_game:
A World in Conflict

In a world where angels and demons coexisted with humans, a fragile peace had reigned for centuries. But this balance was shattered when an epic war between these powerful races began to emerge.

The Fall of Peace

The angels, under the leadership of the majestic Archangel Michael, believed that humans deserved protection and unconditional love. In contrast, the demons, led by the ruthless Prince of Hell Lucifer, saw humans as mere toys for their cruel amusement.

The War That Changed Everything

The war spread like wildfire, engulfing innocent humans in its vortex. Neither side seemed to gain the upper hand until a colossal and devastating battle occurred in the heart of the largest city.

The result was catastrophic: all humans perished. However, an inexplicable miracle happened. Humans were reborn, endowed with angelic and demonic powers.

The Rebirth of Humans

Now, these reborn humans could wield fire and light like the angels, and darkness and mind control like the demons. The most powerful could even summon celestial wings or infernal horns.

The Heroes of the Renaissance

With these new gifts, humans began to fight against the remaining angels and demons. Among them, six extraordinary humans stood out, each with unique and impressive abilities.

Clara, the wise clairvoyant, could foresee the future and guide the group in battles. David, the unerring archer, never missed a shot with his magical bow. Maria, the brave cleric, healed her companions with divine powers. Eduardo, the fearless warrior, wielded a legendary sword with unmatched strength and skill. Oliver, the enigmatic warlock, mastered the dark arts, summoning magical creatures to fight by his side. And finally, John, the relentless monster hunter, who could track and eliminate mythological creatures with lethal precision.

The Living Legend

Together, these heroes faced deadly challenges and unimaginable dangers, defeating mystical creatures and battling angels and demons who still sought to dominate the world. Their goal was to establish peace and harmony among all races - angels, demons, and humans - and to prevent another devastating war from beginning.

These valiant warriors became living legends, known as the "Heroes of the Renaissance". Revered by humans as saviors and seen by angels and demons as symbols of hope for a peaceful future.

Your Choice

It is an inevitable war, but you can choose which side to fight for.

Rebornia: Embark on this epic adventure and decide the fate of the world!
